entry.summary: RT stranzhay.sol/.eth/.near I start full time at in web3 Monday. So many days I reflect and I’m grateful. Just a girl from a holler in West Virginia, who by most statistics should have a needle in her arm. Thankful to myself and my own hard work for getting here. This is still just the beginning for me 🙏
